verses.verse: And I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G4592>sign<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> and <S%G2298>marvelous,<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G4127>plagues;<s%> for in them is <S%G5055>filled<s%> up the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And I <S%G1492>saw<s%> as it were a <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G5193>glass<s%> <S%G3396>mingled<s%> with <S%G4442>fire:<s%> and them that had gotten the <S%G3528>victory<s%> <S%G1537>over<s%> the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> and <S%G1537>over<s%> his <S%G1504>image,<s%> and <S%G1537>over<s%> his <S%G5480>mark,<s%> and <S%G1537>over<s%> the <S%G706>number<s%> of his <S%G3686>name,<s%> <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> of <S%G5193>glass,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G2788>harps<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And they <S%G103>sing<s%> the <S%G5603>song<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses<s%> the <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and the <S%G5603>song<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3173>Great<s%> and <S%G2298>marvelous<s%> are your <S%G2041>works,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3841>Almighty;<s%> <S%G1342>just<s%> and <S%G228>true<s%> are your <S%G3598>ways,<s%> you <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G40>saints.<s%>

<S%G5101>Who<s%> shall not <S%G5399>fear<s%> you, O <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and <S%G1392>glorify<s%> your <S%G3686>name?<s%> for you <S%G3441>only<s%> are <S%G3741>holy:<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%> shall <S%G2240>come<s%> and <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> you; for your <S%G1345>judgments<s%> are <S%G5319>made<s%> <S%G5319>manifest.<s%>

And <S%G3326>after<s%> that I <S%G1492>looked,<s%> and, <S%G2400>behold,<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of the <S%G4633>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%G3142>testimony<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven<s%> was <S%G455>opened:<s%>

And the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out of the <S%G3485>temple,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4127>plagues,<s%> <S%G1746>clothed<s%> in <S%G2513>pure<s%> and <S%G2986>white<s%> <S%G3043>linen,<s%> and <S%G2192>having<s%> their <S%G4738>breasts<s%> <S%G4024>girded<s%> with <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G2223>girdles.<s%>

And <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2226>beasts<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> to the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G5552>golden<s%> <S%G5357>vials<s%> <S%G1073>full<s%> of the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2198>lives<s%> for <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%>

And the <S%G3485>temple<s%> was <S%G1072>filled<s%> with <S%G2586>smoke<s%> from the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and from his <S%G1411>power;<s%> and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> was <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3485>temple,<s%> <S%G891>till<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4127>plagues<s%> of the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%> were <S%G5055>fulfilled.<s%>
